statements: SELECT id, expenses, revenue, resource_budget FROM financial_data;
SELECT resource_budget, revenue, expenses, id FROM financial_data;
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, revenue FROM financial_data WHERE expenses > 5000;
SELECT id, resource_budget FROM financial_data ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT id, resource_budget, expenses, revenue FROM financial_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT resource_budget, revenue, expenses, id FROM financial_data WHERE revenue > 10000;
SELECT expenses, revenue FROM financial_data WHERE resource_budget < 5000 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, resource_budget, expenses, revenue FROM financial_data WHERE expenses BETWEEN 2000 AND 5000;
SELECT id, revenue FROM financial_data WHERE expenses > 3000 ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM resource_budgets ORDER BY budget_date DESC;
SELECT budget_amount, budget_category FROM resource_budgets WHERE budget_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM financial_expenses WHERE expense_category = 'Utilities' ORDER BY expense_amount ASC;
SELECT expense_id, expense_amount FROM financial_expenses WHERE expense_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT DISTINCT budget_category FROM resource_budgets;
SELECT * FROM resource_budgets WHERE budget_amount > 1000 ORDER BY budget_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT budget_id, budget_amount, budget_date FROM resource_budgets WHERE budget_category = 'Marketing' ORDER BY budget_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM financial_expenses WHERE expense_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY expense_amount ASC
SELECT budget_category, SUM(budget_amount) AS total_budget_amount FROM resource_budgets GROUP BY budget_category HAVING total_budget_amount > 5000
SELECT * FROM financial_expenses WHERE expense_category IN ('Operations', 'IT', 'HR') ORDER BY expense_date DESC
SELECT * FROM budgets WHERE budget_id = 1;
SELECT budget_category, budget_amount FROM budgets WHERE budget_amount > 1000;
SELECT expense_amount, expense_category FROM expenses WHERE expense_id = 3 ORDER BY expense_amount DESC;
SELECT revenue_date, revenue_amount FROM revenue WHERE revenue_amount < 5000 ORDER BY revenue_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE expense_category = 'Groceries' AND expense_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM budgets WHERE budget_amount > 1000 ORDER BY budget_id DESC;
SELECT expense_category, SUM(expense_amount) FROM expenses GROUP BY expense_category;
SELECT budget_category, AVG(budget_amount) FROM budgets GROUP BY budget_category HAVING AVG(budget_amount) > 500;
SELECT revenue_date, SUM(revenue_amount) FROM revenue WHERE revenue_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' GROUP BY revenue_date ORDER BY SUM(revenue_amount) DESC;
SELECT expense_category, COUNT(expense_id) AS total_expenses FROM expenses GROUP BY expense_category HAVING COUNT(expense_id) > 3;
SELECT * FROM resource_budgets;
SELECT budget_id, budget_amount FROM resource_budgets WHERE budget_amount > 1000;
SELECT budget_amount, budget_description FROM resource_budgets WHERE budget_description LIKE '%IT%';
SELECT * FROM expenses ORDER BY expense_date DESC;
SELECT SUM(revenue_amount) AS total_revenue FROM revenues;
SELECT * FROM resource_budgets;
SELECT budget_id, budget_amount FROM resource_budgets WHERE budget_amount > 1000;
SELECT expense_category, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expenses FROM expenses GROUP BY expense_category;
SELECT * FROM revenues WHERE revenue_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY revenue_amount DESC;
SELECT u.username, u.email, r.revenue_amount AS total_revenue FROM users u INNER JOIN revenues r ON u.user_id = r.revenue_id WHERE r.revenue_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM budgets WHERE budget_name = 'Marketing Budget';
SELECT budget_name, amount FROM budgets ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT budget_name, amount FROM budgets WHERE amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT account_name, balance FROM accounts WHERE account_type = 'Savings' ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT budget_id, budget_name FROM budgets
SELECT * FROM expenses ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT revenue_id, source, date FROM revenue WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT account_name, balance FROM accounts WHERE account_type = 'Savings'
SELECT transaction_id, category, amount, date FROM transactions WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
